name:
Verify that products can be sorted by price in ascending and descending order. 
Verify that products can be sorted by name in ascending and descending order
Verify error message with an invalid password

Verify successful login with valid credentials. 
Verify user remains logged in after refreshing the products page. 
Verify user can log out successfully and it's redirected to the login page
Verify that all products are displayed on the products page after logging in as a standard user
Verify that navigating directly to a protected page without being logged in redirects user to the login page

Verify a product can be added to the cart and cart badge updates. 
Verify a product can be removed from the cart and cart badge updates accordingly. 
Verify products added to the cart are displayed correctly in the cart page
Verify error message when login and password fields are empty

Verify that user can enter valid first name, last name, and postal code on checkout info page. 
Verify that error appears if any of the required checkout fields (first name, last name, postal code) are empty. 
Verify that user can complete checkout and see the order confirmation
Verify error message when trying to log in with a locked out user
